website_summaries.verdict: A scuba diving vest that will continue to serve you well for an extended period of time.
pros: YKK front zipper can be used millions of times without breaking
Constructed from water-resistant and quick-drying neoprene and nylon
Provides a great vest for dives, water aerobics, and other water activities
Less expensive than many comparable vests
cons: May be too tight for some users
Vest materials sometimes result in an unpleasant odor

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to like this wetsuit
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this wetsuit. Well tailored. Good fit. After first wearing in the pool for 30 minutes, broke out that night in a violently itchy rash with scores of spots like chiggers or fiberglass exposure. After two itchy nights, the rash subsided. Thinking there might be some chemical on the suit, washed it in mild detergent. A week after the first incident gave it another try. Applied Body Glide in case it was a friction problem. That night the same rash came back, only worse. Definitely something wrong with the Neoprene. Incidentally, bought a Natyfly afterward, but didn't wear it because the stitching and labeling is identical. Appears to be made in the same factory.
customer_reviews.author: lwc001

customer_reviews.title: Well made and fashionable design
customer_reviews.text: I really love the design of this. I'm so sad to have to return. The thing is, the matching jacket labeled as a wetsuit, is not actually a full wetsuit, as the sleeves and side panels are the thin patterned fabric of the "V" design on this vest. The vest has the thin layer over the neoprene to make this design whereas the jacket sleeves are of this thin fabric without neoprene under it. Also of note, the vest is labeled "mens" so although it matches the women's shorts and jacket, the vest sizing is mens. It is otherwise very well made and the neoprene quality is thick.
customer_reviews.author: Cate

customer_reviews.title: Fits well and is comfortable - good buy for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought a few various brands of wetsuit tops, and I wear them out fairly quickly. This is a nice, low cost top, and fits me very well. Seems like it will hold up, and would recommend! I ordered a Medium, and I'm 5'8, 170lbs, with an average/athletic build. Only comment is that if you're planning to layer, you might want to consider something that doesn't zip - I wore this under another jacket, and the zippers kind of pushed into my throat
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Order 1 to 2 sizes larger
customer_reviews.text: I wear and extra-large so I ordered a 3XL and it fit pretty good. I could have probably worn a 2XL and it would've been nice and snug and would not have rode up when I was vertical in the water. I use this when I was in Hawaii and it kept me plenty warm when I was snorkeling so it did exactly the job that I needed it to do. I could float effortlessly while viewing fish and did not have to keep treading water. The material had a strong chemical/solvent like smell to it even after wearing it a week in the ocean water. This product is hard to beat for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars for Layatone Wetsuits
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend Layatone. They made sure I received & was pleased with my order. "Joyce" from Customer Service is the most professional customer service representative I have ever dealt with ! She made sure I was happy with my purchase & offered me a discount on a future purchase. My thanks to Joyce & Layatone for being exceptional when so many companies have little concern for their customers.
customer_reviews.author: Makalipo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, runs small, Euro left-side zipper.
customer_reviews.text: I have a 47" chest and wear XL most often, and even L sometimes. This XL was very tight. I could zip it, but barely. I would need a XXL. The zipper if on the wrong side (European and ladies style.). Otherwise, this product has excellent quality. The YKK zipper is nice. Shipping was fast.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: fits size 18 woman, easy to swim with.
customer_reviews.text: So glad I bought this. I've been looking for something that would take off the chill of winter snorkeling. I live in Hawaii so that I don't need much, this is exactly right. PS I'm a size 18 lady and this fits great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Reasonable value for the money. A work in progress
customer_reviews.text: This item gets a 4 instead of a 5 because of the mickey mouse zipper. It isn't much better than the standard zipper you find on the fly of a pair of pants. If they put in a proper rough duty zipper, they get a 5.
customer_reviews.author: the buzzard

customer_reviews.title: A bit tight
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'8 160lbs and a bought the medium. Idk if it's supposed to be like this, but it's super tight on me. The material does feel and look very good though.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Alsayad

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good quality neoprene, excellent non-corroding zipper even though I almost never rinse it in fresh water after use. Fit is not great and it definitely lets in a lot of water through the neck and bottom, but maybe a tighter size would work better for wearing it alone. When worn as a top layer it works great though.
customer_reviews.author: Jalil JacallenTop Contributor: Diving

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Very good dive vest, I'm actual working diver and this is very good for hot summers. Price is good for the quality, ignore the person who got a rash it's not sprayed with chemicals or cheap material if anything smelled very freshly made out of the package like new shoes.Of course it runs small it's made to keep you warm definitely has good stretch to it just order a size bigger that's all. 👌
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: A must-have item
customer_reviews.text: This product is very comfortable the size was perfect as specified just one more item added to scuba gear also good for walks on beaches and snorkeling I recommend this for anyone
customer_reviews.author: Israel Grant

customer_reviews.title: Great vest - perfect for in-between weather
customer_reviews.text: I wear women's size 12 clothes. I bought the vest in Large and it fits well. It's a bit loose in the bust/chest but otherwise perfect. It makes a slightly chilly swim comfortable. Also, the look of the vest is neat.
customer_reviews.author: beachbum61

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for my water aerobics. It keeps me warm enough to complete the hour, even in a cold pool.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Wong

customer_reviews.title: Great warm water wetsuit top!
customer_reviews.text: Great wetsuit top! Use it in a pool to teach SCUBA and under my one piece 3MM wetsuit when teaching open water.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Presnell

customer_reviews.title: I bought 3 vests and kept this one
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 vests and kept this one. Seems like the size is right to me. 6'3" and 175lbs, 42 long jacket size. I bought a large and it's good. It's not totally skin tight everywhere but close enough.
customer_reviews.author: PLS

customer_reviews.title: Fits well, not too short
customer_reviews.text: Fits very well. I'm 6'2", 195 LB. The vest fit perfect. Substantial zipper. Vest length is good goes down to hips. I wish it came with a hood. Use sizing chart! I bought a XXL which I would not have if I did not check the size chart.
customer_reviews.author: Art Beaulieu

customer_reviews.title: Not exactly as discribed
customer_reviews.text: Love it but it's not as discribed there are 2 seams on the sides in the picture but not in real life kinda disappointed... Looks kinda bland with out them
customer_reviews.author: bradford

customer_reviews.title: Husband wears L shirt and XXL fit perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great vest for men or women if you guys don’t care which side zipper is on. My husband loves the vest, he normally wears a men’s L T-shirt & I ordered him a XXL
customer_reviews.author: Canya62

customer_reviews.title: I got this because I'm a Florida girl living up ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this because I'm a Florida girl living up north and never got used to the cold water. This helps me a lot, and I wear it swimming instead of a bikini top!
customer_reviews.author: Tawny Madison

customer_reviews.title: Way too big
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to try for swimming. Followed the size chart but wrong. High on neck not comfy. Armpit area would definately rub.
customer_reviews.author: Gotta_Have_It

customer_reviews.title: We bought a medium and it fits well. Keeps you a lot warmer in the water.
customer_reviews.text: We used this product for conditioning swimming class. My son lost a lot of weight so the water temp affects him. the wetsuit vest helps a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Kieseck

customer_reviews.title: Great product for price, just read other reviews and pay attention to sizing.
customer_reviews.text: Great price and product. Read other individual reviews and payed attention to reviews on sizes and hit it on the money and got a perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Lingenfelter

customer_reviews.title: Very cool pattern
customer_reviews.text: FIt chart was good description; it does run small, so order accordingly. Taking their advice provided a very nice fit.
customer_reviews.author: !Da!2.0

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: I would suggest ordering your regular size. You want the vest to have a snug fit.
customer_reviews.author: Betty E

customer_reviews.title: It fit is too small. I new that it ...
customer_reviews.text: It fit is too small. I new that it probably would be so I ordered 2 sizes too small. It fit know this.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well made vest. I was very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Music Fan

customer_reviews.title: Size
customer_reviews.text: Love it! But it runs very small. My husband usually wears a xlarge and in this product he needs a 2xl
customer_reviews.author: lindsey fry

customer_reviews.title: Not a flattering fit for women
customer_reviews.text: While it fitted mostly this is not a flattering style for women and wouldn’t wear it again as looked like I was turning into a line backer. Material as expected and did keep me warm
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Size runs small
customer_reviews.text: Would have been perfect if it fit. I bought the largest size and it was too small for my husband. He is over 6 feet and weighs 285. I wish they had one size larger!!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Mason

customer_reviews.title: Stretchy and comfortable, not too warm.
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for a bit of warmth, sun protection and buoyancy. Stretchy and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Whitlox Homestead

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It loks pretty handsome. I will try it this summer.
customer_reviews.author: Armando Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: 2 mm vest
customer_reviews.text: Six feet tall 200 pounds bought a 2x. Its not too big. Maybe an XL would have fit. Maybe. Otherwise a very nice vest for water in the 70s
customer_reviews.author: NJF

customer_reviews.title: I don't have a headline. Stop asking.
customer_reviews.text: Good product and better made than the NRS shorty I bought. Using for kayaking. It's a little long for that and bunches under your arms unless you flip the bottom up but otherwise comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: bill44095

customer_reviews.title: Fit is highly inaccurate.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 4xl. It wasn't even the size of a,2xl.
customer_reviews.author: K. Kartchner

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Get past the new rubber smell and it works great good quality and easy to wear
customer_reviews.author: shawn wilson

customer_reviews.title: Sizing
customer_reviews.text: Reading the reviews, I sized up. I at 5'5", 123lbs. Hips fit "ok" upper body wasy way way too large.
customer_reviews.author: SN

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Very good fit, covers entire torso. 3mm thickness is adequate for thermal retention. good stretch characteristics.
customer_reviews.author: roland martinez

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you buging the exact thickness for where you at!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I wish they made the same one but a bit thicker,it wasn't warm enough for my rivers as and lakes
customer_reviews.author: James Marczak

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: The size chart does not reflect the actual size of the suit I had to go 2 sizes larger
customer_reviews.author: HANS

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Amazing wetsuit. Kept me warm here in the Florida springs also great comfortable look as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect wetsuit for my husband. He didn’t want anything real thick and this was the right thickness for snorkeling in Hawaii
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: No problems. Used it as an extra layer over my lightweight wetsuit.
customer_reviews.author: chris a maderc

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: But it's a bit on the thin side, size is equivalent to shirt size
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Ayala

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for a warm water dive in Cozumel. Good quality and great fit.
customer_reviews.author: SP

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I dive every day and the vest has held up very well I've had it for about 2 months now. Only thing I dont like is the zipper is on left side
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I normally wear a XL and I ordered a men's ...
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a XL and I ordered a men's XXL and it fits perfectly. The zipper zips up on the left where men's zippers zip up from the right
customer_reviews.author: mary vodisek

customer_reviews.title: Order 4-5 sizes bigger than you need and you will ...
customer_reviews.text: Order 4-5 sizes bigger than you need and you will need to let this thing air out for many days to get the stench of the material to go away.
customer_reviews.author: RRS

customer_reviews.title: a little thicker that others so the insulating is a little better.
customer_reviews.text: well made. a little thicker that others so the insulating is a little better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: All of his shirts are a med and large so ...
customer_reviews.text: All of his shirts are a med and large so I order a x-large and it was still to tight they run very small in sizes
customer_reviews.author: Brenda C.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Slimming Vest
customer_reviews.text: Definitely order a size larger. Mine fits perfect. It's just what I need, I wear it under my swim shirt and it really is slimming and makes the cold CA Pacific ocean much more bearable. It is a little harder to take off but I did OK peeling it off from the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Greg R.

customer_reviews.title: This is the best swim vest I've owned
customer_reviews.text: This is the best swim vest I've owned. I go through them every 2 years or so. This one is very well made, thick enough, but not too thick (2.5mm can be...), and covers the back of the neck well. It looks great too! A++
customer_reviews.author: Waikiki

customer_reviews.title: I`m glad i did
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'3 and 150 lbs. The medium is too small.The large is the one that fits, I ordered both sizes at the same time to save time. I`m glad i did. Haven`t tried them in the water so far.
customer_reviews.author: Donald H.

customer_reviews.title: The best value for your dollar!
customer_reviews.text: It fit perfectly and protects me from the cold while teaching!
customer_reviews.author: Sara Fernandez

product_meta.title: Layatone Wetsuit Vest Men 2mm / 3mm Neoprene Suit Diving Vest Top Women Scuba Vest Canoeing Sauna Suit Vest Top Swimsuit Sleeveless Wet Suit Adults
feature_bullets: 3mm premium neoprene, prevents body temperature loss, soft and comfortable
Using YKK zipper, Strengthened YKK zipper is designed to allows for easy entry and exit.
For:Scuba Diving, Surfing, Swimming, Snorkeling, Spearfishing, Fitness, GYM, Canoeing, Kayaking, Running, etc.
Please refer to our size table and chose the best size after measuring your Chest/Waist and other data.
